title: Help hacker
body:
Hello Guys,
Yesterday my account got hacked and the hacker gave out all my RP for Viktor... Can I get it back?

replies.body: Schreib bitte ein Ticket an den [Support](http://support.leagueoflegends.com/). Wir im Forum können dir bei solchen Problemen nicht helfen. Beachte bitte, dass der Support für manche Anfragen länger zum Antworten braucht. Sei also bitte geduldig.

Are you Serious? ^^'

Someone could maybe think you spent all your RP on Viktor and don't like him. Since you don't have any refunds left, you try to get your RP back this way. 

Maybee... just maybe I'm right. 
Not blaming you of anything. Just saying... Might be possible... Or so...
write to  support , we from the community cant help you
